price: 34. Qu’ils apportent donc un discours qui lui soit semblable, si ce qu’ils disent est vrai.
arabic: فَلۡيَأۡتُواْ بِحَدِيثٖ مِّثۡلِهِۦٓ إِن كَانُواْ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: falyatū biḥadīthin mith'lihi in kānū ṣādiqīna
